A smart toothbrush that uses AI technology to provide personalized brushing recommendations based on the user's dental history, brushing habits, and oral health goals.
A toothbrush that uses ultrasonic cleaning technology to remove plaque and bacteria from teeth and gums more effectively than traditional brushing methods.
A toothbrush that has a built-in timer and pressure sensor to help users brush for the recommended two minutes and maintain proper pressure to prevent gum damage.
A toothbrush that has a replaceable head and handle, allowing users to customize the color, texture, and shape of their toothbrush to their preferences.
A toothbrush that has a self-sanitizing feature, using UV light or other technology to kill bacteria on the brush after each use.
